title: City Shoes in the Village italics and hyphens

content.question: The tone created by the use of italics and hyphens throughout the passage helps express which of the following perspectives?

choices.label: the children’s excitement at the unexpected arrival of a stranger
the children’s curiosity and suspicion about a man they assume to be English
the children’s surprise and attempt to imitate the sound of the unfamiliar motorboat
Altaf’s realization of his growing inability to understand his native language

content.answer: the children’s excitement at the unexpected arrival of a stranger

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
